image.name: DIRDB-RHEL5.5_x64-DB2 9.7 fp3a-medium -Good for ISD DB2 testing
image.description: Use for ISD testing with DB2. A DB2 9.7 fp3a server is installed on the image. Config scripts are provided with instructions in /db2Config (READTHIS file). Use getbuild in /db2Config to get an ISD driver.
image.attributes: {minmem=512MB, defaultmem=2GB, defaultdisksize=36GB, defaultcpu=2, mincpu=1, maxcpu=8, dynamocapable=true, maxmem=8GB}
